briefdescription.para: This function initializes a timing unit.
This function starts both outputs of the selected HRTIM channel.
This function stops both outputs of the selected HRTIM channel.
This function starts only one output of the selected HRTIM channel.
This function starts only one output of the selected HRTIM channel.
This function sets the modulation mode for a given PWM unit.

simplesect.para: this function must be called BEFORE initializing the selected timer

briefdescription.para: This function sets the switch convention for a given PWM unit i.e. you decide which one of the output of the timer can be controlled with duty cycle.

parameterdescription.para: PWM Switch to be driven by the duty cycle:

simplesect.para: this function must be called before the timer initialization

briefdescription.para: This function initialize the PWM for fixed frequency applications.

detaileddescription.para:
fixed_frequency
frequency to be fixed in Hz
This function must be called BEFORE initializing any timing unit.
The frequency will not vary during the operation of the power device.
Use it for fixed frequencies only.

briefdescription.para: This functions initializes the PWM for variable frequency applications.

detaileddescription.para:
initial_frequency
The initial value of the frequency in Hz
minimal_frequency
The minimal value of the frequency in Hz
This function must be called BEFORE initializing any timing unit.
The user can vary the frequency during the operation of the power device.
This may compromise the resolution of the PWM.
You can check your resolution with the getResolutionPS function.

briefdescription.para: This function sets the dead time for the selected timing unit.

parameterdescription.para: rising edge dead time in ns
falling edge dead time in ns

simplesect.para: use this function BEFORE initializing the chosen timer

briefdescription.para: This function sets the duty cycle for the selected timing unit.
Sets the duty cycle for the selected timing unit using an unsigned integer.

parameterdescription.para: duty cycle value as an unsigned integer

briefdescription.para: This function sets the phase shift in respect to timer A for the selected timing unit.

parameterdescription.para: phase shift value in DEGREES (between -360 and 360)

simplesect.para: Use this function AFTER setting the frequency and initializing the chosen timer

briefdescription.para: This function sets a special pwm mode for voltage or current mode.

simplesect.para: This function must be called BEFORE initializing the selected timing unit

briefdescription.para: This function returns the PWM mode (voltage or current mode)

simplesect.para: PWM mode: VOLTAGE_MODE or CURRENT_MODE
This function must be called before initializing a timing unit

briefdescription.para: This function sets external event linked to the timing unit essential for the current mode.

simplesect.para: this function must be called before initializing a timing unit

briefdescription.para: This function sets the external event linked to the timing unit used for the current mode.
This function returns the modulation type of the selected timing unit.

simplesect.para: The type of modulation Lft_aligned or UpDwn (center aligned)

briefdescription.para: This function returns the switching convention of the selected timing unit.

simplesect.para: Returns the switch convention :

briefdescription.para: This function returns the period of the selected timing unit.

simplesect.para: the period value in number of clock cycles

briefdescription.para: This function returns the maximum period of the selected timing unit.

simplesect.para: the period value in number of clock cycles

briefdescription.para: This function returns the period of the selected timing unit.

simplesect.para: the period value in number of clock cycles

briefdescription.para: This function sets the PostScaler value for the selected timing unit.

simplesect.para: This function must be called after initialiazing a timing unit, and before enabling the adc trigger

briefdescription.para: This function sets the adc trigger linked to a timer unit.

simplesect.para:
Call this function: - BEFORE enabling the adc trigger
- AFTER initializing the selected timer

briefdescription.para: This function returns the adc trigger linked to a timer unit.

detaileddescription.para:
pwmX
PWM Unit: PWMA,PWMB,PWMC,PWMD,PWME,PWMF
ADC number: ADC_1,ADC_2,ADC_3,ADC_4,ADC_5 or
UNKNOWN_ADC if the ADC trigger was not configured for this timing unit.

briefdescription.para: This function enables the adc trigger for the selected timing unit.

simplesect.para: Call this function only AFTER setting the adc trigger and initializing the chosen timer

briefdescription.para: This function disables the adc trigger for the selected timing unit.
This function sets the comparator value at which the ADC is trigered.
This function sets the adc trig rollover mode for the selected timer.

simplesect.para: This function must be called BEFORE initialiazing the selected timing unit

briefdescription.para: This function returns the adc trigger rollover mode for the selected timer.

simplesect.para: Rollover mode: EdgeTrigger_up, EdgeTrigger_down, EdgeTrigger_Both

briefdescription.para: This function sets the number of event which will be ignored between two events.ie. you divide the number of trigger in a fixed period.

listitem.para: decimation = 2, you have twice less adc trigger

simplesect.para: this function must be called AFTER initialiazing the selected timing unit

briefdescription.para: This function disables the interrupt on repetition counter.
This function sets the repetition counter to ISR period.

parameterdescription.para: Number of repetition before the interruption on repetition counter event

briefdescription.para: This function returns the repetition counter value.

simplesect.para: repetition counter value

briefdescription.para: This function configures the interrupt on repetition counter.

parameterdescription.para: Number of repetition before the interruption on repetition counter event

briefdescription.para: This function enables the interrupt on repetition counter.
This function returns the period in s of the selected timer.
Change the frequency/period after it has been initialized.

detaileddescription.para:
frequency_update
The new frequency in Hz
The new frequency can't be inferior to the the one set in the initialization step.
Use it AFTER the initialization of the timing unit.

briefdescription.para: This function returns the minimum frequency of the selected timer in Hz.
This function returns the maximum frequency of the selected timer in Hz.
This function returns the resolution of the timing unit in picoseconds.

detaileddescription.para:
pwmX
PWM Unit: PWMA,PWMB,PWMC,PWMD,PWME,PWMF
The resolution of the PWM depends on the prescaler that is automatically calculated when the master unit is initialized.
For an HRTIM frequency of =170MHz:

listitem.para: PRSCL = 0: fHRTIM x 32 = 4.608 GHz - Res:00184 ps - Min PWM f: 83.00 kHz
PRSCL = 1: fHRTIM x 16 = 2.304 GHz - Res:00368 ps - Min PWM f: 41.50 kHz
PRSCL = 2: fHRTIM x 08 = 1.152 GHz - Res:00735 ps - Min PWM f: 20.80 kHz
PRSCL = 3: fHRTIM x 04 = 0.576 GHz - Res:01470 ps - Min PWM f: 10.40 kHz
PRSCL = 4: fHRTIM x 02 = 0.288 GHz - Res:02940 ps - Min PWM f: 05.20 kHz
PRSCL = 5: fHRTIM x 01 = 0.144 GHz - Res:05880 ps - Min PWM f: 02.60 kHz
PRSCL = 6: fHRTIM / 02 = 0.072 GHz - Res:11760 ps - Min PWM f: 01.30 kHz
PRSCL = 7: fHRTIM / 04 = 0.036 GHz - Res:23530 ps - Min PWM f: 00.65 kHz

briefdescription.para: This function initialize burst mode.
This function sets burst mode parameters.

parameterdescription.para: Number of period of PWM off

briefdescription.para: This function starts burst mode.
This function stops burst mode.
This function deinit burst mode.
Handles all pwm signals for the spin board.

simplesect.para: Use this element to call functions related to the pwm.
